评论概述: PERFECT “BLUE” FOR SOMEONE WHOSE FAVORITE COLOR IS “BLUE”!
评论详情: “Blue” is not my favorite color! Recently I found out that a relative of mine favorite color is no longer “Pink” but “Blue”. When I was putting together a party for her, I had to decide on what I was going to wear. She didn’t ask me but as a favor to her I decided to wear “Blue”.  I already had a “Blue Shirt” but it is a lighter “Blue” and I wanted stripes. So I found this one. It was a hit. It fits perfectly though it does hang a little low on my hands. I don’t really care. If that bothers me I can turn up the cuffs. I wore it over a “Blue Top” and “Blue Leggings”. I’m happy with this shirt. I’m already planning to buy at least two more colors.

The shirt is well made and the blue was more vibrant than expected. It is a very pretty blue. The fabric is not too thin, does not itch, and did not wrinkle to much in my suitcase. I plan to buy another one in a different color.

Really liked this button down shirt as is comfy due to it's loose fit while also being very fashionable. Button down shirt comes just as advertised and is true to size. So far I wore it casually with light ripped Jeans and Chestnut sandals and also in a classier way with Black Slacks and dress shoes. Shirt is thin enough to feel breathable but not see-through. For reference I'm 134lbs and 5'0ft and got a size Small.

I love this shirt, but I wish I would've sized down to a M. It is very roomy. I wanted oversized, so I'll make it work. I will order more colors, but go down in size. For reference, I'm typically a M/8 in most clothes with a 34DDD bust. I went up to ensure no bust gap, but I think it would've been fine.

This shirt is very well made, and I really like the material. I usually order an XL, but the advice online was to order a 2xl, which was a perfect fit. I’m thinking of ordering another one in a different color.
Good shirt. Runs big. Lightweight and nice material

I would try a higher quality item if you want more than one or two wears.....disappointing

Really like the shirt looking forward to wearing it regularly.

I had high hopes for this shirt because other shirts from this brand have fit me well.  I ordered according to the size chart to fit my bust and accordingly, there should have been plenty of ease in the fit.  When it arrived, there was no way that the front could possibly come together over the chest.  Yet, there were volumes of fabric bagging between my shoulder blades in the back.  The chest measurement was probably accurate, but all of the fullness is at the back.  I am not sure whom this is designed to fit, or if I got a defective item, because this is not like any shirt I have ever tried on.  The sleeves are so close together in the front!It is a real pity because the shirt is otherwise made of what appears to be a nice fabric but I'll never know how well it holds up because it is totally unwearable.

评论概述: Cute and versatile button up shirt
评论详情: This shirt is good quality and a super cute stripe pattern. The cotton is sturdy but pliable enough to fit attractively. It washed well and didn’t fade at all. It could be worn at work or for casual events. It is really flattering. I would recommend this as a good versatile shirt. I can see adding this to a travel capsule wardrobe.

I bought two of these shirts and they are the best shirts I have found in a long time. They are made very well and I just love the material. I would say buying these shirts would be worth your money. I will be buying a couple more

This button-down shirt is a great addition to my work wardrobe. The cotton material is comfortable and breathable, making it ideal for long office days. The green and white stripes add a nice touch of style without being too bold. The fit is flattering, and the collar sits nicely. The sleeve length is just right, adding to the overall polished look. It's a versatile and well-made shirt that I find myself reaching for often.

This dress shirt is a nice addition to my wardrobe. It has a style that I can wear in numerous ways, including being layered over a cami for a casual summer look or tucked into slacks for the office. The vertical stripes makes me look slim and elongate my body. I like that it's made of 100% cotton.  I don't mind that I have to iron it after washing. The shirt is breathable and the material is not thin or see-through. As it's loose fitting, it's important to refer to the size chart for the desired fit.

This siliteelon button-down is a wardrobe winner. The cotton fabric feels soft against the skin and the classic stripe pattern is effortlessly chic. It's versatile enough to dress up or down, making it perfect for both work and weekend wear. The fit is true to size and the shirt holds its shape well. Highly recommend!

I actually ordered this about three sizes bigger than my regular one so that I could use it as a pool cover-up at the beach. It was lightweight enough that I stayed cool and the design was really modern and sleek. The sleeves rolled up easily and had a good starch Material built in.

Nice quality classic! I wanted an oversized shirt to layer. I might have been ok getting a small. I had to turn the sleeve cuff up, but fit is very comfortable. Really depends on your preference for sizing. Seems like it is true to size. For reference, I am 5'3" - 125# - 36B with an athletic/boyish build. '
Perfect for winter in the office.
True to size. Size up only if you prefer an oversized fit. Good quality cotton button down. Classic striped style lends an elegant touch to slacks, shirts or jeans. Wardrobe staple.

评论概述: Stylish and Versatile Summer Office Shirt
评论详情: I love the blue stripe color of this shirt, which effortlessly brightens up my outfits. The material is light yet not see-through, making it perfect for warmer months. The fit is slightly loose, so consider sizing down for a more tailored look. The shirt's length is ideal for tucking in, adding to its versatility. The buttons might need reinforcing, but overall, it's a high-quality and stylish addition to my wardrobe.

I ordered an XL for my thicker shoulders and arms, modest bust (39-Ds). I’m big-boned and this shirt actually looks like a million bucks on me. It’s 100% cotton and light, breathable, yet crisp. I tend to wear a lot of grey and this BLACK dress shirt merges white and black beautifully with thinner white stripes. Extremely complimentary and light enough to wear this summer (on the West Coast, USA), so long as I stay indoors. I wash in cold water and hang to dry for fear of shrinkage.

Nice professional striped lines Linen feel fabric True to size Great quality Easy to steam
I would recommend sizing up in this for a lose fit. I normally wear large but did an XL. The shirt is very good quality and feels like 100% cotton. looks and feels like a high end button up.

Love the look of this shirt - got the bright yellow color, which I think really brightens up an outfit so easily and just looks great. Yellow is surprisingly versatile. The buttons are a little iffy - some might pop off from the thread - but otherwise love the quality on this shirt. The material isn't too thin (ie not see through) but is light enough to make it a good choice for warmer months. Love the length, too, great for tucking in. Overall high quality and a really neat design.

I'm so surprised how well this fit me. I have a pretty athletic build despite being a little curvier so that means bigger shoulders and this looks super nice. It's also a little on the thinner side which means when I used it to layer, it looks and feels perfect without folding up or bunching but I think this and slacks is gonna be easy and comfortable! The color is also really nice and will pair perfectly with burgundy, black, or dark blue.

I got this in the red striped and the red is true to the color displayed here. It is a little thinner fabric than I expected and there is no double needle stitching on any seams, which knocks down the quality for me a little.  It is pretty true to size, if not a little generous. I'm 5'4", 162 lbs and got a medium. It easily fits over my chest and rear. It has darts at the bustline, so that gives it a more tailored look.

评论概述: A tad big but very versatile
评论详情: While I think it was my mistake to choose the medium size, it was just a tad bigger than I expected. However, I think for a casual look, that bigger size works best, it just needs to be fitter for more formal outfits. The fabric is very comfortable and breathable and even the packaging it came from was very well put together. The style and color is a classic summer look. Really like it and hope to get eventually other colors as well.

Fit/Sizing - I am 5'8" tall, U.S. women's size 6 (usually), and busty. Checked size chart, ordered Small. Fits well; pics show how I’ll wear it (sun cover in summer over tanks) but had unrestricted movement while buttoned up and sleeves long, no pulling/gaping on buttons over chest. Size is generous- even if it shrinks, I’m not worried about fit, so ordering according to size chart based on your typical U.S. numerical size should work.  Materials/Design - 100% cotton is why I ordered. Yes, cotton wrinkles which is a price I gladly pay for breathable, natural material. No complaints w/ construction. Shoulders were a little pointy/stiff but I think will relax w/ wear. Hard to see in pics but shirt is rather see-through; when worn long, my blue shorts were visible through the material. I don't care at all but mention for those who might. I happen to like the non-stuffy weight of the shirt.  I take time to write honest reviews that I would find helpful, whether favorable or not.

The shirt is made of a nice, thick material and is very smooth. The color is vibrant and it looks very profession. I would probably size down unless you are going for an oversized look, and you will have to iron it out of the package/wash.

评论概述: Soft material, nice look with jeans.  Waist cut is a little wider, so not fitted.

So if you want a more fitted shirt, you might order a size down.I love the versatility to wear the button down out, tucked in or tied in the front.  It looks great with jeans.
Smelled of chemicals. This piled on the collar with the first wash.
Love my purchase

When I ordered this shirt, I somehow knew that it would look and fit well. The color is very vibrant, and the shirt has lots of versatility.  This is a very comfortable button up shirt, and I am very pleased with this order.

My biceps are not that big, for my size (plus) but these shirts, roomy on me everywhere else, were too narrow in the upper arm. The fabric was a bit thinner than I expected as well. I returned them, sadly, because they were very pretty.
This top is cute and I love the green (it is darker than it appeared online and I love it).  Relaxed fit and the perfect Fall essential with some jeans.  Highly recommend!
